text: Anne Melissa Milgram (born December 1, 1970) is an American attorney and academic. She was the Administrator of the Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA) from 2021 until 2025. She was the 57th Attorney General of New Jersey from 2007 to 2010. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official bio Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Drug Enforcement Administration Administrators Category:New Jersey attorneys general Category:People from Perth Amboy, New Jersey Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from New Jersey
title: Anne Milgram
